on the SD card:
  LOOP0.RAW
  LOOP1.RAW
  LOOP2.RAW
  LOOP3.RAW
  RECORD.RAW
  SDTEST1.WAV
  SDTEST2.WAV
  SDTEST3.WAV
  SDTEST4.WAV
  Star Trek sounds/
    alarm1_Klingon_sensor_alert.wav
    alarm1.wav
    alarm4_warp_core_breach.wav
    beamenergize1.wav
    commclose.wav
    commopen.wav
    holoon.wav
    intercom1.wav         
  
#include <Audio.h>
#include <Wire.h>
#include <SPI.h>
#include <SD.h>
#include <SerialFlash.h>

// GUItool: begin automatically generated code
AudioInputI2S            i2s1;           //xy=177,237
AudioEffectDelayExternal delayExt1_( AUDIO_MEMORY_MEMORYBOARD ); //xy=347,628
AudioMixer4              mixer1;         //xy=396,255
AudioMixer4              mixer2;         //xy=624,606
AudioEffectFlange        flange1;        //xy=663,332
AudioEffectChorus        chorus1;        //xy=667,390
AudioEffectBitcrusher    bitcrusher1;    //xy=696,288
AudioMixer4              mixer9;         //xy=993,270
AudioOutputI2S           i2s2;           //xy=1159,253
AudioConnection          patchCord1(i2s1, 0, mixer1, 0);
AudioConnection          patchCord2(i2s1, 1, mixer1, 1);
AudioConnection          patchCord3(delayExt1_( AUDIO_MEMORY_MEMORYBOARD ), 0, mixer2, 0);
AudioConnection          patchCord4(delayExt1_( AUDIO_MEMORY_MEMORYBOARD ), 1, mixer2, 1);
AudioConnection          patchCord5(delayExt1_( AUDIO_MEMORY_MEMORYBOARD ), 2, mixer2, 2);
AudioConnection          patchCord6(delayExt1_( AUDIO_MEMORY_MEMORYBOARD ), 3, mixer2, 3);
AudioConnection          patchCord7(mixer1, bitcrusher1);
AudioConnection          patchCord8(mixer1, 0, mixer9, 0);
AudioConnection          patchCord9(mixer1, flange1);
AudioConnection          patchCord10(mixer1, delayExt1 ( AUDIO_MEMORY_MEMORYBOARD ));
AudioConnection          patchCord11(mixer1, chorus1);
AudioConnection          patchCord12(mixer2, 0, mixer1, 3);
AudioConnection          patchCord13(flange1, 0, mixer9, 2);
AudioConnection          patchCord14(chorus1, 0, mixer9, 3);
AudioConnection          patchCord15(bitcrusher1, 0, mixer9, 1);
AudioConnection          patchCord16(mixer9, 0, i2s2, 0);
AudioConnection          patchCord17(mixer9, 0, i2s2, 1);
AudioControlSGTL5000     sgtl5000_1;     //xy=613,200
// GUItool: end automatically generated code



  
// set up for something or other
#include <Audio.h>
#include <Wire.h>
#include <SPI.h>
#include <SD.h>
#include <SerialFlash.h>

// GUItool: begin automatically generated code
AudioSynthKarplusStrong  string1;        //xy=277,425
AudioInputI2S            i2s1;           //xy=289,354
AudioEffectDelayExternal delayExt1;      //xy=365,615
AudioMixer4              mixer1;         //xy=458,383
AudioPlaySdWav           playSdWav1;     //xy=528,750
AudioSynthWaveform       waveform1;      //xy=562,859
AudioMixer4              mixer2;         //xy=640,613
AudioEffectBitcrusher    bitcrusher1;    //xy=693,441
AudioEffectMultiply      multiply1;      //xy=778,680
AudioMixer4              mixer9;         //xy=881,441
AudioOutputI2S           i2s2;           //xy=1011,466
AudioConnection          patchCord1(string1, 0, mixer1, 2);
AudioConnection          patchCord2(i2s1, 0, mixer1, 0);
AudioConnection          patchCord3(i2s1, 1, mixer1, 1);
AudioConnection          patchCord4(delayExt1, 0, mixer2, 0);
AudioConnection          patchCord5(delayExt1, 1, mixer2, 1);
AudioConnection          patchCord6(delayExt1, 2, mixer2, 2);
AudioConnection          patchCord7(delayExt1, 3, mixer2, 3);
AudioConnection          patchCord8(mixer1, delayExt1);
AudioConnection          patchCord9(mixer1, bitcrusher1);
AudioConnection          patchCord10(mixer1, 0, mixer9, 0);
AudioConnection          patchCord11(playSdWav1, 0, multiply1, 0);
AudioConnection          patchCord12(waveform1, 0, multiply1, 1);
AudioConnection          patchCord13(mixer2, 0, mixer1, 3);
AudioConnection          patchCord14(bitcrusher1, 0, mixer9, 1);
AudioConnection          patchCord15(multiply1, 0, mixer9, 2);
AudioConnection          patchCord16(mixer9, 0, i2s2, 0);
AudioConnection          patchCord17(mixer9, 0, i2s2, 1);
AudioControlSGTL5000     sgtl5000_1;     //xy=580,280
// GUItool: end automatically generated code
